title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: During a text change event with word wrap enabled, the StyledText component is experiencing inefficient redraws.
EB: The StyledText component should perform redraws more efficiently when changing the text with word wrap enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, add the following line to the performPaint method of the StyledText component:

System.out.println('lineCount ' + lineCount + ', paintY ' + paintY + ', renderHeight ' + renderHeight);
